actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to discontinue the payment of student benefits to children beyond the high school level.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that an individual who is receiving child's insurance benefits on the basis of being a full-time student shall only receive such benefits while under age 21 but not beyond graduation from high school.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to discontinue the payment of student benefits to children beyond the high school level.
